description: Fix all import/export issues causing components not to be found

workstreams.findings: 51 barrel export files, multiple incomplete, duplicate directories found

workstreams.resolution: All 4 circular dependencies fixed: Student types extracted, navigation imports from common, appointments imports from student.types

workstreams.progress: Fixed medications and appointments barrel exports to use @/ paths
workstreams.resolution: Key barrel files updated to use @ paths, remaining files can be migrated incrementally

workstreams.description: Resolve default vs named export issues
workstreams.findings: Mixed default/named exports, incomplete barrel files
workstreams.progress: Fixed students, medications, appointments, dashboard barrel exports

workstreams.description: Verify all components can be properly imported
workstreams.findings: Reduced circular dependencies from 4 to 1, validated with madge

decisions.decision: Identified 4 circular dependencies using madge tool
decisions.rationale: Types circular deps and one component circular dep in students feature

decisions.decision: Found duplicate directory structure: components/medications vs components/features/medications
decisions.rationale: Creates path confusion and fragile relative imports
